item.description:
Final Update:

The event location: Cambridge Common - this is the green patch between Mass Ave, Waterhouse St and Garden St.

http://maps.google.com/maps?f=q&source=s_q&hl=en&geocode=&q=cambridge+common.+cambridge,+ma&sll=37.0625,-95.677068&sspn=31.426353,53.173828&ie=UTF8&hq=Cambridge+Common+His...

If you can't find the place, meet me at Whitney's at 37 JFK St, Cambridge, MA 617-354-8172. I'll be there at 2.20pm and we can then head towards Cambridge Common at around 2.35. It's a 5-7 minute walk from there. After the pillow fight, let's head to a nearby place for food/drinks.

 

PS: I'll be the guy wearing the Santa Claus hat - in this season of Lent, one endeavors to stand out.

If you can't find anyone from meetup, give me a call at 508-479-7876. Pl don't leave a VM :)

 

___________________________________________________

 

 

 

April 2 is the International Pillow Fight Day (!@#$). Show up with a pillow, preferably concealed. At 3pm, at the sound of the airhorn, start the fight!

Wearing a costume and carrying your enthusiasm is highly recommended. Pillows that tear and mess up the place are not.

Time: 3:00PM, at the sound of the airhorn (Show up at least 5 minutes early)

Place: TBA on April 1st at 12pm (should be T-accessible, in the central Boston area).

Main website: http://www.misteriosos.org (I'll post details here on this Nerd Fun meetup page as well).

PS: I had earlier posted this event on another group site: http://www.meetup.com/chill-lax/events/16880263/ Sign up here, sign up there, gather peeps from everywhere. We'll all meet at the same place. I'll have a sign (of sorts) *wry_evil_grin*
item.why: It's exciting, spontaneous, and memorable. A flash mob is a large group of people who gather at a public location to perform a pre-defined action, and disperse rapidly after the event ends. Event site: http://www.misteriosos.org/
